Page 18: (iii)	 The count rate increases when the paper gets thinner. (bbox: (75.27909851074219, 83.91401672363281, 367.44207763671875, 98.3380126953125), font: MyriadPro-Regular, size: 12.0)
Page 18:  (bbox: (42.51909637451172, 107.89002990722656, 45.06309509277344, 122.31402587890625), font: MyriadPro-Regular, size: 12.0)

Page 18: Give (bbox: (90.50709533691406, 107.89002990722656, 122.55908966064453, 122.31402587890625), font: MyriadPro-Regular, size: 12.0)

Page 18: reason for this increase. (bbox: (143.10308837890625, 107.89002990722656, 263.48712158203125, 122.31402587890625), font: MyriadPro-Regular, size: 12.0)
Page 18: (1) (bbox: (495.79510498046875, 121.45005798339844, 510.23114013671875, 136.31805419921875), font: MyriadPro-Bold, size: 12.0)
Page 18:  (bbox: (42.51909637451172, 206.4136505126953, 45.06309509277344, 220.837646484375), font: MyriadPro-Regular, size: 12.0)
Page 18:  (bbox: (60.94389343261719, 206.4136505126953, 63.487892150878906, 220.837646484375), font: MyriadPro-Regular, size: 12.0)
